attributes.action: Abolish the twice a year clock change.
attributes.additional_details: It hugely messes with circadian rythmn and I am sure would be a massive benefit to health, if abolished, which in turn saves the NHS money.
attributes.background: For many years I have believed the clocks changing twice a year is unnecessary, so would like the Government to look to abolishing it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Make British Summer Time (BST) permanent year-round" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739222
